# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/chai`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for chai (http://chaijs.com/).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/chai/v4.

### Additional Details
 * Last updated: Tue, 24 Sep 2024 19:07:24 GMT
 * Dependencies: none
